{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWDR300A-73 |revision= |upc=662705532424 |asin=B001FTKVBS |fcc_date=06/23/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=AR7505QW23 |manuf_rev=4-A-LF-32 |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=O9C-WL603 |ic_id=2299L-WL603 |pcb_id=141750520004J |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50610 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Qimonda |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306S |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=3Com |default_ssid_regex=^3Com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
"P/N: 141750520004J REV: 0B RoHS" is silkscreened on the main board.
This device is the [[SMC SMC7904WBRA-N]] (also a AR7505QW model). :Default setttings are per the FCC manual.
*US: 3CMDL01BWL603
